actions.name: BatchGetItem
actions.description: Grants permission to return the attributes of one or more items from one or more tables

actions.name: BatchWriteItem
actions.description: Grants permission to put or delete multiple items in one or more tables

actions.name: ConditionCheckItem
actions.description: Grants permission to the ConditionCheckItem operation that checks the existence of a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

actions.name: CreateCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to create a DAX cluster

actions.name: CreateParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a parameter group

actions.name: CreateSubnetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a subnet group

actions.name: DecreaseReplicationFactor
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more nodes from a DAX cluster

actions.name: DeleteCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned DAX cluster

actions.name: DeleteItem
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a single item in a table by primary key

actions.name: DeleteParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified parameter group

actions.name: DeleteSubnetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a subnet group

actions.name: DescribeClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about all provisioned DAX clusters

actions.name: DescribeDefaultParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to return the default system parameter information for DAX

actions.name: DescribeEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to return events related to DAX clusters and parameter groups

actions.name: DescribeParameterGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of parameter group descriptions

actions.name: DescribeParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to return the detailed parameter list for a particular parameter group

actions.name: DescribeSubnetGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of subnet group descriptions

actions.name: GetItem
actions.description: Grants permission to the GetItem operation that returns a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

actions.name: IncreaseReplicationFactor
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more nodes to a DAX cluster

actions.name: ListTags
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list all of the tags for a DAX cluster

actions.name: PutItem
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new item, or replace an old item with a new item

actions.name: Query
actions.description: Grants permission to use the primary key of a table or a secondary index to directly access items from that table or index

actions.name: RebootNode
actions.description: Grants permission to reboot a single node of a DAX cluster

actions.name: Scan
actions.description: Grants permission to return one or more items and item attributes by accessing every item in a table or a secondary index

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a set of tags with a DAX resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the association of tags from a DAX resource

actions.name: UpdateCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the settings for a DAX cluster

actions.name: UpdateItem
actions.description: Grants permission to edit an existing item's attributes, or adds a new item to the table if it does not already exist

actions.name: UpdateParameterGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a parameter group

actions.name: UpdateSubnetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an existing subnet group
